com.crowdmap.java.sdk.net
Interface HttpClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
CrowdmapHttpClient
public interface HttpClient

Interface for the HTTP Client to be used for the web service interactions

Returns:

setUserAgent

void setUserAgent(java.lang.String agent)
Set the value to set as the user agent header on every request created. Specifying a null or empty agent parameter will reset this client to use the default user agent header value.

Parameters:
agent - The String labeling the user agent.

getUserAgent

java.lang.String getUserAgent()
Get the user agent

Returns:
The user agent

setConnectionTimeout

Parameters:
connectionTimeout - The connection timeout in miliseconds

getConnectionTimeout

int getConnectionTimeout()
Get the connection timeout.

Returns:
The set connection timeout

setSocketTimeout

void setSocketTimeout(int socketTimeout)
Set the socket timeout. The default socket timeout is 3 secs.

Parameters:
socketTimeout - An int that specifies the socket timeout value in milliseconds

getSocketTimeout

int getSocketTimeout()
Get the socket timeout.

Returns:
The socket timeout in milliseconds
